tips.li: The Brotherhood of Steel fiercely protects its knowledge. Nevertheless, some exotic merchants can still give you access to their technologies.
Pre-war mainframes can be purchased in Brotherhood of Steel settlements or via caravan traders, provided you are not at war with them.
The Brotherhood of Steel often maintains unstable and paranoid relations toward outsiders. Fortunately, they mostly stand receptive to acts of goodwill.
In its frantic race for lost knowledge, it is very likely that the Brotherhood of Steel eventually reached the prerequisites for interstellar journeys.
"The only salvation this tortured planet and its people have. Without us, humanity is sure to perish." - Brotherhood Scribe Vree
The Brotherhood of Steel is a quasi-religious technocratic military order, founded in 2082 by members of the United States Armed Forces and government scientists.
There are growing rumors of frightening figures in black power armor roaming the desert.
Light recon armors allows colonists to mitigate the movement penalty induced by T-serie armors.
Losing secured datakeys can be considered an act of treason and punishable by death. This is why the majority of Enclave officers carry them, rather than taking this risk.

The Enclave is a post-War institution that developed from continuity of government of the pre-War federal government of the United States of America, frequently styling itself as the United States of America.
Unless you prove your American citizenship, the Enclave will always be hostile to you. Whenever. For whatever reason.
If you choose to play for the Enclave, expect strong opposition from other factions, and very few allies.
"Another glorious day in this man's army !"
